issue_log: Pre-commit hook validate-json-ci attempts to validate all JSON files
Empty JSON file found in agent_orchestrator virtual environment
json.load() fails on empty files with JSONDecodeError
This is a third-party package file that should not be validated

structured_details.root_cause: Third-party package with empty JSON schema file

solution: Update .pre-commit-config.yaml validate-json-ci hook to exclude agent_orchestrator/ directory
Alternative: Remove the empty JSON file if it's not needed
Consider using more specific JSON file patterns to avoid third-party packages
JSON validation now properly excludes virtual environment packages
